text: Mauro Sérgio Viriato Mendes or simply Maurinho (born October 11, 1978 in Fernandópolis), is a Brazilian former professional football right back. ==Honours== ===Club=== *Brazilian League (3rd division): 2001 *Brazilian League: 2002, 2003, 2006 *Minas Gerais State League: 2003, 2004 *Brazilian Cup: 2003 ===Individual=== *Brazilian Bola de Prata (Placar): 2003 ==External links== * CBF * sambafoot * Guardian Stats Centre * zerozero.pt Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Ituano FC players Category:Esporte Clube São Bento players Category:Sertãozinho Futebol Clube players Category:Paulista Futebol Clube players Category:Santos FC players Category:Cruzeiro Esporte Clube players Category:São Paulo FC players Category:Goiás Esporte Clube players Category:Grêmio Barueri Futebol players Goncalves, Gilberto Ribeiro Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Association football wingers Category:People from Fernandópolis Category:Brazil international footballers
title: Maurinho (footballer, born 1978)
